origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'RealEstateAPI.evaluate_project', 'description': 'This function evaluates the investment value of a real estate project based on its details, historical price data, and potential rental income.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'projectDetails', 'type': 'OBJECT', 'description': 'Details of the project including location and building area.'}, {'name': 'historicalPriceData', 'type': 'OBJECT', 'description': 'Historical price data of the area over the past five years.'}, {'name': 'rentalIncomeAnalysis', 'type': 'OBJECT', 'description': 'Analysis of the potential rental income from the project.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'investmentRecommendation', 'description': 'The recommendation based on market data and project characteristics.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行

调用工具 RealEstateAPI.evaluate_project, 它的参数输入如下: 'projectDetails'是{'location': '北京市朝阳区', 'buildingArea': 15000}, 'historicalPriceData'是{'years': 5, 'trend': '逐年上涨'}, 'rentalIncomeAnalysis'是{'potentialRentalYield': '5%'}
